text: Hi! My name is Yi-Chin, Shang. I am now a bachelor of Computer Science and Information Engineering in National Taiwan University. I am an outgoing and upbeat girl who always have high energy. I am active in university and participates numerous activities in school. Working with people allows me to gain lots of teamwork experiences and skills to get along with others. In addition, I am good at problem-solving as well as communicating and own great critical thinking skills.
